Chengdu No.7 Middle School plans to apply for a professional public opinion monitoring agency to provide public opinion monitoring and early warning services for the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A student from Qingyuan No. 2 Middle School was persuaded to drop out of school because he posted a funny video on TikTok.
In the video, a Chiang Kai-shek imitator who has been very popular on the Internet recently dances on a photo of the gate of Qingyuan No. 2 Middle School. The title is "Christmas is coming, Qingyuan No. 2 Middle School specially invites Principal Chiang of the Whampoa Military Academy to dance passionately."
